00021 #ifndef OUTPUTSTREAM_H_
00022 #define OUTPUTSTREAM_H_
00023 
00024 
00025 #include "../Core/BoolConvertible.h"
00026 #include "../Core/Exception.h"
00027 #include "../Core/Array.h"
00028 
00029 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00030 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00031 
00032 class OutputStream : public virtual BoolConvertible<OutputStream> {
00033 public:
00034 
00035     OutputStream() : closed(false) {
00036     }
00037     virtual ~OutputStream() {
00038 
00039     }
00040     virtual void close() {
00041         closed = true;
00042     }
00043 
00044     virtual void flush() {}
00045     virtual void write(const Array<byte> b, off_t off = 0, size_t len = 0) {
00046         if(len = 0) len = b.length;
00047         if(off+len > b.length) sthrow(ArrayException, "Array out of bounds");
00048         for(idx_t i = off; i < off+len; i++) {
00049             operator<<(b[i]);
00050         }
00051     }
00052     virtual void write(const byte b) {
00053         operator<<(b);
00054     }
00055 
00056     virtual OutputStream& operator<<(const byte b) = 0;
00057     OutputStream& operator<<(const Array<byte> b) {
00058         write(b);
00059     }
00060 
00061     OutputStream & operator<<(OutputStream&(*f)(OutputStream&)) {
00062         return f(*this);
00063     }
00064 
00065     bool toBool() const {
00066         return !closed;
00067     }
00068 protected:
00069     bool closed;
00070 };
00071 
00072 inline OutputStream& flush(OutputStream& s) {
00073     s.flush();
00074     return s;
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00079 #endif  /* OUTPUTSTREAM_H_ */
